projects.name: FeaturesAnalyzer
projects.description: Python desktop application for dataset feature analysis, prototyping and testing ML and statistical models. Built with GTK, Pydantic, TinyDB, and i18n.

projects.name: ZSOM
projects.description: Implementation of the Self-Organizing Maps algorithm in Python. Visualization and clustering of high-dimensional data.

projects.name: weasyprint-pdf-render
projects.description: A high-performance HTML-to-PDF rendering Dockerized microservice. CI/CD pipeline with automated documentation.

projects.name: AutoThrottleSetup
projects.description: Manual configuration tool for unexpected thermal throttle on Linux. Automates CPU frequency and power management.

projects.name: linuwu-sense-dkms
projects.description: DKMS kernel module for Linux hardware sensor monitoring. Provides custom driver support for temperature and fan sensor readings.
